noGlobalDirnameFilename.description:
Description

Disallow the use of__dirnameand__filenamein the global scope.
They arenot available in ES modules.
Starting with Node.js 20.11,import.meta.dirnameandimport.meta.filenamehave been introduced in ES modules, providing identical functionality to__dirnameand__filenamein CommonJS (CJS).
noGlobalDirnameFilename.option: This rule has no specific options.
